alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Griggs; Steele (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:41PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Griggs, northwestern Barnes and southwestern Steele Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wimbledon, or 28 miles northwest of Valley City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wimbledon, Hannaford, Dazey, Luverne, Sibley, Walum and Revere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
